# Mobility data routing

This package provides a set of tools to route mobility data.


## Setup environment

### 1. Install poetry

```
pip install poetry
```

### 2. Create project

```
poetry init
```

### 3. Install dependencies

```
poetry install
```

### 4. Build with poetry

```
poetry build
```

### 5. Publish to PyPi

```
poetry publish
```
